db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Menu type provides a QML API for native platform menu popups.
Menu can be used in a MenuBar, or as a stand-alone context menu. The following example shows how to open a context menu on right mouse click:

db:section.db:title: Availability
db:section.db:para: A native platform menu is currently available on the following platforms:

db:listitem.db:para: Linux (only available as a stand-alone context menu when running with the GTK+ platform theme)

db:section.db:para: The Qt Labs Platform module uses Qt Widgets as a fallback on platforms that do not have a native implementation available. Therefore, applications that use types from the Qt Labs Platform module should link to QtWidgets and use QApplication instead of QGuiApplication.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] data : list<Object>
db:section.db:para: This default property holds the list of all objects declared as children of the menu. The data property includes objects that are not MenuItem instances, such as Timer and QtObject.

db:section.db:title: enabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the menu is enabled. The default value is true.

db:section.db:title: font : font
db:section.db:para: This property holds the menu's font.

db:section.db:title: iconName : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the theme name of the menu's icon.

db:section.db:title: iconSource : url
db:section.db:para: This property holds the url of the menu's icon.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] items : list<MenuItem>
db:section.db:para: This property holds the list of items in the menu.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] menuBar : MenuBar
db:section.db:para: This property holds the menubar that the menu belongs to, or null if the menu is not in a menubar.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] menuItem : MenuItem
db:section.db:para: This property holds the item that presents the menu (in a parent menu).

db:section.db:title: minimumWidth : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the minimum width of the menu. The default value is -1 (no minimum width).

db:section.db:title: [read-only] parentMenu : Menu
db:section.db:para: This property holds the parent menu that the menu belongs to, or null if the menu is not a sub-menu.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] systemTrayIcon : SystemTrayIcon
db:section.db:para: This property holds the system tray icon that the menu belongs to, or null if the menu is not in a system tray icon.

db:section.db:title: title : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the menu's title.

db:section.db:title: type : enumeration
db:section.db:para: This property holds the type of the menu.
Available values:

db:td.db:para: An edit menu with pre-populated cut, copy and paste items.

db:section.db:title: visible : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the menu is visible. The default value is true.

db:section.db:title: aboutToHide()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the menu is about to be hidden from the user.

db:section.db:title: aboutToShow()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the menu is about to be shown to the user.

db:section.db:title: void addItem(MenuItem item)
db:section.db:para: Adds an item to the end of the menu.

db:section.db:title: void addMenu(Menu submenu)
db:section.db:para: Adds a submenu to the end of the menu.

db:section.db:title: void clear()
db:section.db:para: Removes all items from the menu.

db:section.db:title: void close()
db:section.db:para: Closes the menu.

db:section.db:title: void insertItem(int index, MenuItem item)
db:section.db:para: Inserts an item at the specified index in the menu.

db:section.db:title: void insertMenu(int index, Menu submenu)
db:section.db:para: Inserts a submenu at the specified index in the menu.

db:section.db:title: void open(MenuItem item)
db:section.db:para: Opens the menu at the current mouse position, optionally aligned to a menu item.

db:section.db:title: void open(Item target, MenuItem item)
db:section.db:para: Opens the menu at the specified target item, optionally aligned to a menu item.

db:section.db:title: void removeItem(MenuItem item)
db:section.db:para: Removes an item from the menu.

db:section.db:title: void removeMenu(Menu submenu)
db:section.db:para: Removes a submenu from the menu.
